review_title: Dynamic, fast-paced Charity, values-driven with a strong culture

review_title: Inspiring place to work with a passionate team
job_title: Gifts and In Memory Engagement Officer in Farnborough, Hampshire, South East England, England
pros: The Brain Tumour Charity is a very inspiring place to work as the team are so passionate about the charity's mission and it shows every day. The team is very collaborative with lots of cross-working opportunities. There is a real focus on praise and thanking members of the team for doing well and going beyond expectations. There is also a real sense of community in the team with a huge emphasis on employee physical and mental wellbeing. The office is located conveniently in a town 35 mins outside London with great public transport links and a car park that is free to use. Work life is very flexible with working from home actively encouraged, 25 days annual leave and the opportunity to earn back time over Christmas for volunteering throughout the year.
cons: The learning and development opportunities are slowly getting better but I think that there is still more to be done to encourage career progression and retention at the charity.
